channel.title: Problem whit mopar
channel.description: Is it possible to make a privete game whit nointernet in Lan?It would be gread if we would have a privet server where we can Player Kill each other.Im going away and there wount be nointernet put we would have Lan.If its possible can any1 teach me or show me how. Thank You.

item.title: Problem whit mopar
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Yeh, I suppose. You can do LAN Gaming with other games, so I don’t see why not. If you’re using Hamachi then I can see it working.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem whit mopar
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

I don’t think you can host it with no internet but you can code it all you want, with only you being able to get on it.

Read full topic
